# Resolution now sets automatic by ControlAltAI-Nodes

## Used aspect ratios:
  Portrait - "2:3 (Classic Portrait)"
  Square - "1:1 (Perfect Square)"
  Landscape - "16:9 (Panorama)"


# WORKFLOWS EXPOSED PARAMETERS
